feature_model.name: CFDP Library
feature_model.feature_tree: :r CFDP Library (f_CFDP_Library) :g [1, *] : Send (f_Send) :o Send Acknowledged Mode (f_Send_Acknowledged_Mode) :o Send File System Operations (f_Send_File_System_Operations) :o PUS Rename (f_PUS_Rename) :o PUS Copy (f_PUS_Copy) : Receive (f_Receive) :o Receive Acknowledged Mode (f_Receive_Acknowledged_Mode) :o Receive File System Operations (f_Receive_File_System_Operations) : PUS (f_PUS) :o Reboot PUS (f_Reboot_PUS) : Reboot (f_Reboot) :o Reboot Entity (f_Reboot_Entity)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~f_PUS_Rename or f_Receive_File_System_Operations constraint_2:~f_PUS_Rename or f_PUS constraint_3:~f_PUS_Copy or f_PUS constraint_4:~f_PUS_Copy or f_Receive constraint_5:~f_Reboot_PUS or f_Reboot
